PLUGIN_DEVELOPED_BY: Plugin based on ChangeLogs byKenshimdev, edited by ByFow for MineWeb.
CL_PRESENTATION_TITLE: Inform your players of the latest interventions on your machines, as well as the future.
CL_AUTHOR_ERROR: The "Author" field is mandatory and must be between 2 and 50 characters long.
CL_COMMENT_ERROR: The field "Intervention" is mandatory and must be at least 10 characters long.
CL_ERROR_OCCURED: An error has occurred. Try again, please !
